Reviews.Title: POLAROID 15.4" DIGITAL FLAT PANEL TV.
Reviews.Author: Zelda E. Owens "ZBIRD"
Reviews.Content: I THINK THIS IS A GREAT SMALLER SIZE TV AND NOT TOO EXPENSIVE. I HAVE THIS ON MY KITCHEN COUNTER AND REPLACED THE OLDER ONE WITH A PICTURE TUBE THAT TAKES UP TOO MUCH SPACE. THE PICTURE IS CLEAR AND THE SOUND IS GOOD. NOT AS GREAT AS MY SONY IN MY BEDROOM BUT THAT'S A SONY NOT THIS. I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS TV TO ANYONE WANTING A SMALLER TV THAT USES LESS SPACE. MY SON HAS HAD ONE OF THESE TVS IN HIS KITCHEN FOR OVER A YEAR AND LOVES IT. THIS IS WHY I BOUGHT ONE.

Reviews.Title: good poduct
Reviews.Author: Jesus Enriquez Muãoz
Reviews.Content: Good product, best for this price I guess. The only thing I found was a wrong pixel on the screen, but Im not worry for that.

Reviews.Title: Great Polaroid Product
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv!  The picture quality exceeds most tv's in its size and class.  It even had HDMI port for gaming sessions where I wanted to go somewhere else to play and not pack big TV.  Component cables where all included, and picture on that is great to.  Overall very impressed!

Reviews.Title: Dangerous Fire Hazard
Reviews.Author: Brock
Reviews.Content: MINE LIT ON FIREI HAVE KNOWN THIS TO HAPPEN TO MANY FRIENDS OF MINE AS WELLDO NOT BUY ANY POLAROID TELEVISIONTHEY ARE DEFECTIVE
